lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 2 (AP) -- Yugoslav Partisans fought on bitterly today against the Germans as Russian armies driving into the Crimea brought nearer the restoration of Sevastopol as the Black Sea base of the Soviet Fleet and as a possible springboard for a thrust against Rumania and Bessarabia.
abstract: entire Ger hold on Balkans seen menaced
